name: Apothecary (Andrew Comet)
description:
Become a master apothecary, learning the properties of new elements while dealing with unknown ingredients in your recipes!

Instructions

Click and drag elements on the periodic table to organize them as you see fit and help you find the correct recipe for each level.

Right click on elements to change their color to whatever you believe best fits their attributes.

Credits

This game was made for your enjoyment by Andrew Comet. :)
